title: Bill Gates Gives Up The Digital ID Game (Ep 1870)
description:
In this episode, I address the real reason globalists like Bill Gates are pushing digital ID and vaccine passports. 

News Picks:

Gates Foundation pledges $200 million for international digital IDs.


Is this the dumbest fact-check of the year? 


Clinton campaign manager who spread Trump-Alfa Bank story involved in DHS election censorship.

The mask psychos are back again.

Are MAGA voters underwater?



Joe Manchin’s treachery is finally catching up with him.
